lead_paragraph: JACK Quartet’s multimedia concoction, “Flight,” featured readings, video projections and music by the composer Roger Reynolds.

headline.print_headline: Homage to Aviation, From Plato to Earhart
headline.main: Review: A Musical Homage to Aviation, From Plato to Earhart

snippet: JACK Quartet’s multimedia concoction, “Flight,” featured readings, video projections and music by the composer Roger Reynolds....
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews premiere of multimedia concert Flight, which features readings, video projections and music composed by Roger Reynolds and performed by JACK Quartet, at Park Avenue Armory.
